GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.15.77
GSD.description:
nfc: virtual_ncidev: Fix memory leak in virtual_nci_send()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.77 by commit 88e879c9f59511174ef0ab1a3c9c83e2dbf8a213, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit e624e6c3e777fb3dfed036b9da4d433aee3608a5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: nfc: virtual_ncidev: Fix memory leak in virtual_nci_send()
